ComicInfo.Summary:
Maniac, Hammerhead, Shakespeare, Superstar and Gunslinger -- brought back to life from a comatose state by Omen Enterprises with bleeding-edge technology neural implants that allow them to mimic Harbinger abilities one at a time. Their mission: to oppose the machinations of Toyo Harada and the Harbinger Foundation. Together they make up the elite of the Harbinger Active Resistance Division -- the H.A.R.D. Corps!
Attacking a Harbinger base, the H.A.R.D. Corps run up against the huge Eggbreaker, Big Boy. Fighting to the end, the H.A.R.D. Corps' own Maniac is slain by Big Boy! All this, just to steal a computer disc which is unknowingly rigged with a homing pulse that reveals the secret location of H.A.R.D. Corps headquarters. Still shocked by Maniac's death, the H.A.R.D. Corps is under attack by overwhelming Harbinger Foundation forces.
